content: quote: Originally posted by sw614: quote: Originally posted by Proudformermarine: quote: Originally posted by Vicdude: The Don had a forth "son." Who was that? Tom Hayden. AKA Robert Duvall What was young Vito's (in GFII) last name in Sicily? Duane A. Brinson Lahina, Hi. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989 Wasn't it Antonio Antonini? Vito Andolini.
quote: Originally posted by sw614: quote: Originally posted by Proudformermarine: quote: Originally posted by Vicdude: The Don had a forth "son." Who was that? Tom Hayden. AKA Robert Duvall What was young Vito's (in GFII) last name in Sicily? Duane A. Brinson Lahina, Hi. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989 Wasn't it Antonio Antonini?
reply: Vito Andolini.
